## Correlation and Covariance
```{r}
Sigma <- matrix(c(1, -0.7, -0.7, 1), nrow = 2)
Sigma_inv <- solve(Sigma)
test_inv <- Sigma %*% Sigma_inv
```

## Matrix Compositions
```{r}
A <- chol(Sigma)
t(A)

# This equals Sigma
t(A) %*% A
```

## Orthogonal Vectors and Matrices
```{r}
x1 = cbind(rnorm(10))
x2 = cbind(rnorm(10))

X = cbind(x1, x2)

t(X) %*% X


```
